Who we are?

Your Technology Partner

Latin Digital started out with the purpose to bridge the gap between Businesses and their Digital Blue Prints. Our core competency is building custom solutions and support using the latest technologies and frameworks in the industry.

In this site you can see our previous work as well as learn about our team, process and important topics in the field of web development and digital marketing. Reach out to us through the chatbot or contact form to learn more.

  • Free Hosting & SSL
  • Lightning Speed
  • Unhackeable
  • Static CMS

Github and Jekyll

Our Static Website Development is powered by Github Pages and Jekyll. Github Pages is a static web-based hosting service that serves websites on a CDN making sites up to 10 times faster than legacy CMS. All Github pages instances also come with SSL certificate included that brings an extra level of security to our clients.

Read More

Lighthouse Development

Google Lighthouse is an open-source tool for improving the quality of web pages. You can run it against any web page and run audits for performance, accessibility, seo, and more. We benchmark our development process using Google Lighthouse to guarantee top results.

Check Our Speed

Impossible to Hack

There's no reason to have a massive, unwieldy CMS with a database when you are running a fast secure and beautiful static site. With a static site, you don’t have to worry about malicious code being injected into your site when users visit it. Static sites are built on a production machine (probably the machine you are reading this on) by static site generators, which take your code and spit out flat HTML files with CSS and JavaScript

Read More

Static Content Management

A Static CMS allows us to provide our clients a user friendly admin interface to manage all their content. Forestry and Contentful are our top choices for providing a powerful content management experience for our clients SEO purposes.

Read More

What we do

Strategy

We conduct research to drive product innovation and work to bridge the gap between business objectives and user experiences.

UX & UI

We create intuitive interfaces, experiences, and focus on ease of use by the end user at every step of the product cycle.

Development

We choose the proper framework for the project and build the application from the ground up while conducting rigorous QA at every step.

Optimization

We provide you with the tools to increase traffic to your site or app and use the latest techniques in digital marketing for analyzing that traffic.

Who we work with

Local Businesses


We work with a variety of local businesses in Austin Texas. As a proud member of the community we love helping small businesses grow and optimize their web presence.

Startups


We love partnering with startups that want to disrupt industry standards through technology. We are commited to making your vision a reality through performing technology.

Digital Agencies


Having a technology partner in the Marketing and PR business is a must for success. By using the right resources we aim to empower your agency thruough engaging user experience and escalable solutions.

Professional Services

We've helped Realtors, Lawyers, Doctors and many other professionals with their online presence. We take a leap into your industry standards and create a unique web persona that you can feel proud of showing.
